name: MIS View Finance Audit Log
description:
Lists every financial transaction for a chosen date range to allow interrogation of who performed those transactions and shows: date, time, user ID, NOMS Number, prisoner surname and initials, the transaction type, the account the transaction affected, the amount and whether a credit or debit.
FIN0032 v00.00.08 Last Modified 19/06/2019

dataset.name: Prisoner Transactions
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DAY_DATE, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_TIME, nvl(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.MODIFY_USER_ID,nvl(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.CREATE_USER_ID,'Not Recorded')), AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_AMOUNT, AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TXN_POSTING_TYPE_DESCRIPTION, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ID, AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TXN_ENTRY_SEQ, AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_NAME, AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_TXN_OB.SURNAME, AT_TXN_OB.INITIALS, AT_TXN_OB.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC, AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_CASELOADS, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_BUSINESS_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_TXN_OB, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC WHERE ( AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK ) AND ( AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK=AT_DIM_TXN_POSTING_TYPE.TRANSACTION_POSTING_TYPE_SK ) AND ( AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DATE_SK=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK ) AND ( AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK=AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_TXN.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK ) AND ( AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_SK=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ESTABLISHMENT_SK ) AND ( AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DATE_SK=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK ) AND ( AT_TXN_OB.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK and AT_TXN_OB.BOOKING_SEQ=1 ) AND ( BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC_SK=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DESC_SK ) AND ( ( AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code from prompt_) ) AND ( AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DAY_DATE between '19-10-2020 00:00:00' and '22-10-2020 00:00:00' and AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE between to_date('19-10-2020 00:00:00')-1 and '22-10-2020 00:00:00' ) AND ( AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE IN ('All') Or 'All' in ('All') ) )), dataset_ AS (SELECT FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Current Location
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_TXN_OB.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SHORT_DESCRIPTION, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION, BODIMIS.DIM_CELL AT_DIM_LOCATION, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_CASELOADS, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_TXN_OB, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_BUSINESS_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING WHERE ( AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_TYPE_SK ) AND ( AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DATE_SK=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_ENTRY_DATE_SK ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK and AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ=1 ) AND ( AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_SK=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ESTABLISHMENT_SK ) AND ( AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DATE_SK=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.TRANSACTION_BUSINESS_DATE_SK ) AND ( AT_TXN_OB.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK=AT_FACT_OFFENDER_TRANSACTION.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK and AT_TXN_OB.BOOKING_SEQ=1 ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID=CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username from context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= to_char(sysdate,'YYYY')-6 ) ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK=AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK ) AND ( AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG='Y' ) AND ( AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_SK=AT_DIM_LOCATION.UNIT_4_SK(+) ) AND ( ( AT_CASELOADS.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code from prompt_) ) AND ( AT_DIM_DATE_TRANSACTIONS.DAY_DATE between '19-10-2020 00:00:00' and '22-10-2020 00:00:00' and AT_BUSINESS_DATE.DAY_DATE between to_date('19-10-2020 00:00:00')-1 and '22-10-2020 00:00:00' ) AND ( AT_DIM_TRANSACTION_TYPE.TRANSACTION_TYPE IN ('All') Or 'All' in ('All') ) )), dataset_ AS (SELECT FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)
